channel.title: Rabbitmq on A Humbly Arrogant Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rabbitmq on A Humbly Arrogant Blog

item.title: RabbitMQ One consumer blocking others
item.description: I’ve been working on a distributed application that requires multiple workers to process items from a queue. I decided to use RabbitMQ as the queue. However I noticed that there was a 10 minute pause or whenever the consumer started up. After looking into it further I noticed that it appeared that only one consumer could run at any given time.
